about_the_game:
Orisha is about a people called the Nok chosen by the gods that need to come together and bring balance and peace in all phases of life. You will have to piece together their past, learn to control their power and free your people from the Norme's rule. Use the rhythm of life to win battles, gather the leaders of each tribe to join your journey and heal the severed bonds of life.




Orisha is based on characters and occurrences from a plethora of West African mythologies and it is set in the ancient and mystical land of Ife. Players are immersed in a sprawling narrative that unfolds within a world plagued by disharmony and teetering on the precipice of collapse and corruption of the people’s way of life by a great, malevolent force. In a realm where equilibrium holds the utmost significance in every aspect of life, Orisha explores themes of balance the delicate interplay between the elements, the mind, the body, and the intricate tapestry of relationships between individuals, men and women alike.





Orisha aims to pull players along on Oluwatosin’s odyssey, beckoning them to be more than just participants in its grand tale of strife and redemption, but to become emissaries of harmony and ambassadors of the interwoven tapestry that connects all living beings. Through the eyes of Oluwatosin, they bear witness to the devastating consequences of imbalances in the physical and spiritual realms, as well as the intimate relationships between individuals. As a direct consequence of their choices and actions, the balance of the world may be rekindled as Oluwatosin inspires the other tribes to stand united against the forces of evil, or it may descend further into darkness and chaos.

Orisha aims to present the player with fun and challenging gameplay, an engaging narrative, and a vehicle for introspection and contemplation on the harmony that exists between all things. The player embarks on a quest of epic proportions, where the realms of light and shadow converge, and the delicate balance between them teeters on the precipice of annihilation. Amidst the chaos, discover the untapped depths of courage and resilience within, for the future of Ife and the very essence of existence hangs in the balance. Players’ choices will dictate the outcome of events as they tread the delicate tightrope that exists between order and discord As they forge alliances, conquer formidable adversaries, and nurture the intricate bonds of relationships, they embark on a journey that strives to stimulate in them the appreciation of balance in all aspects of existence. Will you rise above the encroaching shadows and usher in a new era of equilibrium, or will the forces of chaos prevail, plunging the world into irreversible darkness?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It includes general mature content and may depict nudity. In some African cultures, nudity is not seen as sexual or vulgar. The game showcases these cultural differences regarding nudity in Africa. All content is intended to teach and illustrate the cultural, historical, and lore aspects of Africa.

short_description: You are the Prince or Princess of an epic journey to bring balance back to the world. Travel to each tribe leader's land and convince them to join your journey. Play solo or co-op with another friend. Be careful of the choices you make. Each choice you make will doom your world or Bring new life.
